alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 15 at 11:12PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain continues to be possible WHERE...American Samoa WHEN...Through Saturday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. Be prepared for heavy rainfall, which may be slow moving. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rainfall can cause low visibility and gusty winds. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 1112 Po Aso Faraile Tesema 15 2023 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE Aso Toona`i... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa| NOFOAGA...Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Toona`i AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele. E tatau ona e fa`alogologo pea i tala o le tau ma nofo sauniuni mo ni lapata`iga o tafega ma lologa e tu`u atu. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O timuga mamafa e mafua ai fo`i ona fa`aitiitia le va`ai mamao ma agi fa`ata`uta`u ai savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.
